titleStmt.title: A health to all good-fellowes: or, The good companions arithmaticke To the tune of, To drive the cold winter away.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by A. Mathewes] for Henry Gossen,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and suggested publication date from STC.
Verse - "Be merry my hearts, and call for your quarts,".
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
